title: Piastri fastest as Norris, Leclerc crash in pitlane - Singapore GP FP2 results
summary: Piastri goes fastest amid interruptions and a pitlane crash between Leclerc and Norris

qa_pairs.question: Which driver achieved the fastest time in the second practice session of the Singapore GP?
What incident occurred in the pitlane during the Singapore GP FP2?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: A crash between Leclerc and Norris
wrong_options: A driver collision with a team member

qa_pairs.question: Which two drivers were involved in a crash during the Singapore GP FP2?
